ComicInfo.Summary:
Nuance
DOUBLE-SIZED ONE-SHOT!
Where does Logan go from here? What is Lilith's next move? In this special one-shot issue, we've invited some of our favorite guest writers and artists to tell short stories about your favorite Destiny, NY characters.
Destiny, NY returns for Season Three in October!
*Contents* Logan McBride in Systole Diastole Brody McBride in Alley Cat Cherry Gilbert in Whispters Anthony Lily in Clear As Day Henley Golden in Slow and Steady Arvid Bergman in Loyalty Rewards Song Aberdine in Sister, Sister Lilith Aberdine in All of the Ways It Could Have Been
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/destiny-ny-13-nuance/4000-715261/
